events.message: The customer reported their vehicle was involved in a rear-end collision on the highway, resulting in damage to the bumper and trunk.
The claim was reviewed and classified under Auto Accident due to the keywords indicating a collision involving the insured's car.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the investigation and coordinate with the claimant.
The claimant was notified that their auto accident claim was received and is now being processed by our team.
The claimant was asked to provide photographs of vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates to move forward.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report, damage photos, and initial repair quotes.
An investigation was initiated to verify the collision details and assess the extent of damage to the insured vehicle.
The investigation concluded confirming the collision damage matched customer’s description and supporting evidence.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and policy coverage was proposed to the claimant for approval.
The claimant responded with acceptance of the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the timely handling.
The claim was officially approved based on all documentation and verification completed successfully.
Insurance payment for the approved claim amount was processed and issued to the claimant’s account promptly.
The auto claim case was closed after payment confirmation and final communication with the claimant.
All documents and records related to this auto accident claim were archived securely for future reference.
